rules_text: {2}, Sacrifice another creature: Create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“A shame—he would have made a fine warrior. Ah, well. He will make an even finer keepsake on my mantle.”[/i]
